Related repos

  • lightweight Python library for building RAG pipelines with LLM and document retrieval support
  • low-code toolkit for building and evaluating RAG systems
  • Toolkit for automating setup and optimization of RAG pipelines with dashboard and SDK for easy configuration
  • tiny CLI tool for automating repetitive tasks with pipelines
  • All-in-one RAG system for multimodal document processing
  • Notebooks for building RAG pipelines
  • Plant piping design software with Python customization
